value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Now, with the power given to me
by King Njörðr, I will perform the
Rite of Light.$k$p$EFace_Cool|...Light.
...Golden radiance.
...Bearer of time.$k$p...Fill this vessel.
...Reveal the seer.$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Ah...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A-are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|I can see light...bursting out from
everywhere I look... I can see...
all that it touches.$k$pNo matter where in the nine realms
she might go, I should be able to
find Gullveig now.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Excellent. Where is she now? Is she
still in Midgard?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Let me see, child of Midgard...
I can see all of Midgard before
me now...$k$pGullveig is...not there.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|She must be in another realm now
then, right?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Nifl's ice...Múspell's flame...Hel's
dead... She is among none of these.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|One of the other realms, then!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Neither Ljósálfheimr's dreams nor
the nightmares of Dökkálfheimr
conceal her...$k$pNor do the dvergar of Niðavellir,
nor the jötnar of Jötunheimr...$k$pShe is not to be found among
any of these realms...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Really? Then where could she
possibly be?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|If none of those realms, then...$k$pThen she must be here...
in Vanaheimr!$k$pYes... I've found her. I see her now.$k$p...She's coming for us!$k$p$Sbs4000|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...G-Gullveig?!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|All of time is mine to decide, to
dictate as I please. Even this, here
and now, I willed to be.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... Children of Midgard, we
have to flee!$k$pThis is not the Gullveig of the
present! This is the Golden Seer
at her full strength!$k$pKing Njörðr warned us—we will not
be able to defeat her as she is now.
We need to find her past self!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|You cannot leave here. I have made
sure there is nowhere for you to run.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gullveig has us completely sealed
into this area...$k$pWe have no way out!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|We stand no chance against her...
What choice do we have but to fight?$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...Hmph.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No. We have to run.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but we have nowhere to—$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We will flee into the past.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The past?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I, too, am a goddess of Vanaheimr.
With the power granted to me by
King Njörðr, I will make it happen.$k$pLight is time, and time is light...
We can escape by going into
the past.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Th-the past...when? A few days ago?
How far back?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I cannot say. This is my first time
wielding this power...$k$pIt may be a mere moment or years
upon years upon years...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Th-that sounds like quite the risk!
Shouldn't you practice a bit before
trying something like this?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|There is no time for practice.
We must go now.$k$pTake hold of me, children of Midgard.
We are going to the past!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...I will not allow it. You will go
nowhere, $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|No, $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gullveig! Let go! Oh no, it's too late...
Time is...already shifting!$k$pBut...$Nu!$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|
